title: HOUR 3- Reggie Miller Sep 09, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Reggie Miller Sep 09, 2020
description:
Reggie Miller says that Giannis should stay in Milwaukee. Reggie says they took a chance on his potential and that Giannis should reward the team that took a chance on him. Reggie says that if he was managing Giannis, that he would have him take the max offer and stay with the Bucks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
